EventFilterType.title: type
EventFilterType.description: Filter events by type. If omitted, all event types are included.

TopicFilters.title: topics
TopicFilters.description: List of topic filters. If omitted, query for all events. If multiple filters are specified, events will be included if they match any of the filters. Maximum 5 filters are allowed per request.

SegmentMatcher.title: SegmentMatcher
SegmentMatcher.description:
A `SegmentMatcher` is one of the following:

- For an exact segment match, a string containing a base64-encoded ScVal

- The string "*" functions as a wildcard that matches exactly one segment.

- The string "**" matches zero or more segments and is used to match events with variable topic lengths. It can only appear as the final segment.

TopicFilter.description:
A `TopicFilter` is `SegmentMatcher[]`

- The list can be 1-4 `SegmentMatchers` long.
